channel.title: League of legends
channel.description:
Come on gentlemen, brilliant game, certainly deserves more community attention. It's free to play (obviously you can buy things for riot points such as skins for champions).
Moparscape topic:
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,542194.0.html
Currently we have an IRC channel for sorting out games/discussion so join #LoL if interested. For those who don't know what it is at all:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Z_78J6FEouM&feature=fvst
There are loads of videos, and sites for introducing you to the game too.

item.title: League of legends
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

Vayne is fucking sweet. She’s pretty useless till about level 7 or so, but once you get your final ability you’re set to hunt down people.
I went like 15-5 with her or something, didn’t take a pic. Used the boots with +25% att speed, 2 bloodthirst swords, 1 battleaxe w\ +55att %30 speed, and a +40% sword (don’t really know many names…).

Read full topic

item.title: League of legends
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

OK here are some tips:

If you’re not playing a support champion, concentrate on getting creep score (CS). This means last hitting and not just auto attacking a minion to death. You also don’t want to push too hard because if you ever play against a jungler and you are pushed to their turret you WILL get killed horribly. Another thing is, don’t just build the recommended items. You should look for something that suits your playstyle and champion. Your build should have about 4 core items (which you will almost always build in any match) and a few other circumstantial items. Don’t focus on building too much damage, you’ll end up being too squishy to help. Inb4 BUT I AM RANGED well there are many champions with gap closers, and if you’re playing the AD carry (basically the main source of damage late game) you won’t be able to help your team if you’re dead, even if you can dish out 800 damage per hit.

This game is really fun, but it needs tooo much practice to get good at. It’s also not fun playing solo because you almost always end up with complete idiots and flamers and just 2 good players on your team.

On a side note, who else thinks the new Darius guy is too OP? He doesn’t even get fed and can tank a turret and 3 champions and get away with a kill…

Read full topic

item.title: League of legends
item.dc:creator: @classic mopmans little slave
item.description:
@classic wrote:

[quote=“Tom_BETA, post:12, topic:439765”]Currently banned for 24 hours for leaving games, fucking hate solo queuing .I always get some moron team who don’t even know what they’re doing there.

Though me being Tom_BETA, I took it upon myself to challenge the support team who banned me via email. It started with me asking for an unban, and now a few emails later we’re on to riots business ethics and the personal experiences of the support team.

Its only a 24 hour ban, but I’m bored in between so I’m going to just email them back for 24 hours or so.

inb4 the guys just doing his job[/quote]
Good thing your a cool cat and figured out how to play anyway

Read full topic

item.title: League of legends
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

reyx7:

They don’t repeal bans from leaving games under any circumstances.

That wasn’t really my objective though, I just needed something to do so felt like voicing my rather longly typed opinion on how they could improve a few things.
